title: World Health Day 2023: Top 10 Foods to Boost Your Immunity
author: Ravi Shankar
description: World Health Day is celebrated annually on April 7 to raise awareness about global health issues and to promote a better and a healthy lifestyle for everyone around the world.
cleaned_text: Apr 6, 2023 World Health Day is observed every year on April 7 to raise awareness about health issues that affect people globally and to promote a better and a healthy lifestyle for everyone around the world. Image Source: Pexels There are various types of foods available in the market that can actually help improve your immune system and keep you healthy for longer. Some of the best foods are; Image Source: Pexels Garlic has compounds containing sulfur that can actually help boost a person's immune system. Image Source: Pexels Ginger has anti-inflammatory properties that can help in boosting your immunity. Image Source: Pexels Yogurt contains probiotics which are helpful in boosting the immune system by promoting the growth of healthy gut bacteria. Image Source: Pexels Fruits like grapefruits, lemons, and oranges contain a high amount of vitamin C, which is known to enhance the production of white blood cells and antibodies in the human body. Image Source: Pexels Spinach is high in vitamin C, as well as antioxidants and beta-carotene, which are all good for the immune system. Image Source: Pexels Almonds contain high amount of vitamin E, which can help in improving immunity. Image Source: Pexels Turmeric contains curcumin, which the anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties than can help boost the immune system. Image Source: Pexels It contains bioactive compounds and is high in antioxidants that can help boost immunity. Image Source: Pexels Strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries are high in vitamin C and contain antioxidant properties that can again help boost your immunity. Image Source: Pexels Shellfish, such as clams, crab, and lobster, are high in zinc, which can of course help in improving the person's immunity. Image
